Mayor's Office
==============

Mayor's Welcome
---------------

Welcome to Corsicana, Texas, and to our website. We are a city of approximately 25,000 located 55 miles south of Dallas on I-45.

The City of Corsicana has an outstanding parks system, and Richland-Chambers and Navarro Mills Reservoirs offer excellent fishing and water sport activities. Pioneer Village presents an authentic look at our area beginning with the mid-19th century.

Most of all, Corsicana's friendly citizens welcome you. As mayor, and speaking for the City Council and dedicated city employees, I welcome you to Corsicana.
